projects.title: Activity Viz
projects.summary: Kinect Data Activity Visualization is designed to be an add-on visualization tool to the existing Kinect data analysis programs such as ELAN and ChronoViz for Gesture Researchers.
projects.target: Gesture Researchers such as ASL who use Microsoft Xbox Kinect

left1.title: MAIN TOOLS.
left1.body: Node.js | MongoDB | Mustache | Passport | D3.js | x3dom | HTML | Bootstrap | Github | Heroku.

left1.title: INFRASTRUCTURE DIAGRAM.
left1.body: We intended to gather data (CSV format) from the XBox Kinect, process the CSV data through an operating system, then generate a 3D visualization that provides direct manipulation by using d3.js and x3dom.

projects.note: Demo Instruction: create an account or use username:zhenxzheng pw:123456789, skip uploading file by clicking on visualization button on nav bar to see visualization demo.

projects.title: UCSDMap
projects.summary: UCSDMap is designed for UCSD students, staffs, and all visitors to help navigate the campus of UCSD.

left1.title: MAIN TOOLS.
left1.body: Node.js | Handlebars | JSON database | Google Map API | Google Analytic | HTML | Bootstrap | Github | Heroku.
